item.title: About me
item.description: About me Hi there, I’m Paul Willot. I grew up in France and moved to Japan for my first job. I started as a programmer, mainly for tasks centered on machine learning, and recently moved into project and team managements. I enjoy talking about machine learning, programming, sysadmin and life in Japan. Though I can’t promise to reply immediately, feel free to contact me. I’m happy to talk to you!
